title: relictornic
author: relictornic
content: Hello, dear bitcointalk users (or administrators).Today I found a new english-speaking cryptocurrency community, who started it's life just a month ago, but they are already making giveaways as advertising compains for new users.I found it from "ethereum mining method 2023" in google, that's all.So, you need:1 - open comcryx.com community.2 - find "Freebies" section".3 - find topic "$100 giveaway for all members" and leave 3 commentaries on site.4 - have you luck!Direct topic link: https://comcryx.com/threads/100-giveaway-for-all-users-who-will-comment-this-topic.149/Have a good day all, who will read this article.And peace, that's the most important nowadays
